presentationColumns.name: Total Amount Without Tax
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total amount for line category as order and return without tax details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Total Amount Without Tax

presentationColumns.name: Order Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total amount for line category as order

presentationColumns.name: Open Order Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for line category as order for open sales orders
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Open Order Amount

presentationColumns.name: Past Due Order Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines where scheduled ship date is less than system date and line are not shipped and for line category as order
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Past Due Order Amount

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines which are shipped

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines which are shipped on time
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Amount

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Late Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines which are not shipped on time
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Shipped Late Amount

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Line Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines which are perfect order lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Line Amount

presentationColumns.name: Lines Shipped in Full Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines which are shipped in full
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Lines Shipped in Full Amount

presentationColumns.name: Billed Order Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the total billing amount for line category as Order
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Billed Order Amount

presentationColumns.name: Open Return Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines with line category of return for open sales orders
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Open Return Amount

presentationColumns.name: Returned Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as amount for lines with line category of return and for closed sales orders

presentationColumns.name: Unit List Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of unit list price.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Unit List Price

presentationColumns.name: Unit Selling Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of unit selling price.
